src:
Embarazada pierde la vida tras ser brutalmente atropellada
La joven mujer de 16 años de edad tenía 8 meses de embarazo, murió cuando era atendida en un hospital 
04 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Sandra Audelo Leyva
Reynosa, Tamaulipas.- Una joven mujer perdió su vida y la de su bebé luego de que fuera brutalmente arrollada por un conductor que presuntamente circulaba a exceso de velocidad y bajos los efectos del alcohol.
La infortunada mujer de solamente 16 años de edad tenía 8 meses de embarazo, murió tras resultar gravemente lesioanda luego de ser atropellada la madrugada de ayer (domingo) cuando se encontraba en una carreta de hotdogs acompañada de su papá.




El conductor que acabó con la vida de la joven mujer y su bebé responde al nombre de Marcos Alán, de 22 años mismo que conducía una camioneta GMC 2010.
La fémina que murió era Ana Karla, de 16 años de edad, su papá resultó herido el cual fue identificado como Francisco Javier R.A.
Tras el accidente ambos fueron trasladados a diferentes hospitales pero lamentablemente la mujer embarazada no logró sobrevivir debido a los fuertes lesiones, murió cuando era atendida en el Hospital General.
Luego de darse a conocer la lamentable noticia agentes investigadores y peritos de la Procuraduría General de Justicia del Estado, arribaron al nosocomio para iniciar las investigaciones por delito de homicidio culposo en contra del conductor.






Tamaulipas


Fallecimiento


Accidente
text:
Pregnant loses her life after being brutally run over
The young 16-year-old woman was 8 months pregnant, died when she was treated in a hospital
04 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Sandra Audelo Leyva
Reynosa, Tamaulipas.- A young woman lost her life and that of her baby after she was brutally overwhelmed by a driver who allegedly was speeding and lowered the effects of alcohol.
The unfortunate woman of only 16 years of age was 8 months pregnant, died after being seriously injured after being run over yesterday morning (Sunday) when she was in a hotdogs cart accompanied by her father.




The driver who ended the life of the young woman and her baby responds to the name of Marcos Alán, 22, who was driving a 2010 GMC truck.
The female who died was Ana Karla, 16, her father was injured and identified as Francisco Javier R.A.
After the accident both were transferred to different hospitals but unfortunately the pregnant woman failed to survive due to the strong injuries, she died when she was treated at the General Hospital.
After the unfortunate news of investigative agents and experts from the State Attorney General's Office was released, they arrived at the hospital to initiate investigations for the crime of manslaughter against the driver.






Tamaulipas


Death


Accident
